InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input to the Level Scalars filter.

IntVectorProperty.name: Avg
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Foreach field on Gauss Points : computes a cell field lying of input mesh that is the average of the values associated to the set of Gauss points for each cell.

IntVectorProperty.name: Max
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Foreach field on Gauss Points : computes a cell field lying of input mesh that is the max of the values associated to the set of Gauss points for each cell.

IntVectorProperty.name: Min
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Foreach field on Gauss Points : computes a cell field lying of input mesh that is the min of the values associated to the set of Gauss points for each cell.
